sentence.Network_en: I descry a sail on the horizon.
sentence.Network_cn: 我看见在天水交接处的轮船.

sentence.Network_en: In this beautiful sunset photo, I seem to descry the wings of the angel.
sentence.Network_cn: 在美丽日落照片中, 我好像看到天使的翅膀.

sentence.Network_en: Learn to foster an ardent imagination; so shall you descry beauty which others unheeded.
sentence.Network_cn: 学会培养炽热的想象力, 这样你就能发现别人视而不见的美.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps confused with obsolete descry 'describe', variant of obsolete descrive (via Old French from Latin describere 'write down'), which also had the meaning 'perceive'

auth_sentence.content: I still in the thin clear murk of dawn Descry her gliding streams.
auth_sentence.res_content: I still in the thin clear murk of dawn Descry her gliding streams.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I still in the thin clear murk of dawn Descry her gliding streams.

sentences.en: He descried an island far away on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 他看到遥远的地平线上有个岛屿。
